item.title: Perplexity launches Sonar API, taking aim at Google and OpenAI with real-time AI search

item.title: Tencent introduces ‘Hunyuan3D 2.0,’ AI that speeds up 3D design from days to seconds
item.description: Tencent's Hunyuan3D 2.0 transforms images into detailed 3D models in seconds. This could reshape how industries create virtual content.
